Html:
I need an "editable" chart to graphically manipulate tabular data. Specifically, I'd like to visualize the data as a chart with one or more line series and drag and drop the data points vertically to change the dependent values. Any thoughts on how I might accomplish this with the WPF Toolkit charts?

Thanks!
Ryan

Hi Ryan, did you manage to find an editable chart? I need the same functionaliy. It seems to be quite complex to implement. However, I have to do it, if I cannot find any other solution. Any help or idea is appretiated.

Thanks! Daniel
